<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='iv',FILE='C:\JMS\kthiyag\05-12324-2\task497002\12324-2-ki-01.htm',USER='kkthiyagarajan',CD='Jul 19 05:11 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">LEASE
AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS LEASE AGREEMENT (hereinafter called this &#147;Lease Agreement&#148; or this
&#147;Lease&#148;) is made and entered into as of the 14 day of June, 2004 (the &#147;Effective
Date&#148;), by and between the INDIANAPOLIS AIRPORT AUTHORITY, a municipal
corporation existing under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Indiana
(the &#147;Authority&#148;), and AAR AIRCRAFT SERVICES, INC., a corporation incorporated
in the State of Illinois and authorized to do business in the State of Indiana,
with its principal office at 1100 North Wood Dale Road, Wood Dale,
Illinois&#160; 60191 (&#147;Tenant&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH
THAT:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Authority owns and operates the Airport; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Authority owns and holds a leasehold interest in the Land
and the Facilities that have been developed on the Land; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Authority shall lease to Tenant pursuant to this Lease
Agreement the leasehold interests of the Authority in the Leased Premises,
which constitute a portion of the Land and Facilities; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Tenant is engaged in the aviation and aerospace business,
including the business of providing aircraft maintenance, repair and overhaul
services to commercial airlines and other operators of aircraft, and related
services; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Tenant desires to lease the Leased Premises upon the terms and
conditions hereinafter stated:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and payments
herein contained, the Authority and Tenant hereby agree as follows:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><a name="ArticleI_012122"></a><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I.</font></u></h1>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">DEFINITIONS</font></h1>

<h1 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><font style="text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></h1>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><a name="Section101_012127"></a><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;101.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Definitions</u>
below:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;145 Certificate&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;302(G)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Act&#148; means Indiana Code 8-22-3.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Activate&#148; or &#147;Activation&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;205(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Activation Notice&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;205(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Actual Facilities Costs and Expenses&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(B)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\kthiyag\05-12324-2\task497002\12324-2-ki-01.htm',USER='kkthiyagarajan',CD='Jul 19 05:11 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Additional Rent&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(B)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Additional Rental Per Square Foot Per Annum&#148; has the meaning set forth
in Section&nbsp;601(B)(2)&nbsp;of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Affiliate&#148; means any entity, directly or indirectly, controlled by,
controlling, or under common control with Tenant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Air Operations Area&#148; means any portion of the Airport designed and
used for landing, taking off, or surface maneuvering of airplanes.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Airport&#148; means the Indianapolis International Airport.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Airport Director&#148; means the Airport Director of the Airport.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Apron&#148; means that area shown on <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;I</font></b>
to this Lease, as the same may be amended by the Authority from time to time.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority&#148; means the Indianapolis Airport Authority, a municipal
corporation duly organized and operating under the laws of the State, including
the Act, or any successor thereto or assignee thereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority Permits&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;704 of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority&#146;s Non-Compliance Notice&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;705(D)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority&#146;s Notice of Proposed Agreement&#148; has the meaning set forth in
Section&nbsp;2105(A)(3)&nbsp;of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Authority Termination Event&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;504(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Available Equipment&#148; means those items of Equipment on the Master List
of Equipment that have not already been provided to Tenant for its then
currently Occupied space at the Leased Premises.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Available Space&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2105(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;BAA&#148; means BAA Indianapolis LLC, an Indiana limited liability company.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;BAA USA&#148; means BAA USA (Holdings),&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Baseline Environmental Audit&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;705(C)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Base Rent&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\kthiyag\05-12324-2\task497002\12324-2-ki-01.htm',USER='kkthiyagarajan',CD='Jul 19 05:11 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Bay&#148; means that separate area, within a Hangar, which comprises
approximately one-half (1/2) of the Hangar.&#160;
A &#147;Bay&#148; includes all of the office, storage, and employee support space
associated with that particular Bay.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Bond Issues&#148; means the City Bonds, the State
Bonds, and the Special Facility Bonds.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Casualty&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1601(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;City Bonds&#148; means one or more series of tax-exempt revenue bonds,
including refunding bonds, issued by the Redevelopment Authority payable solely
from lease rentals from legally available funds of the Commission.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Commission&#148; means the Metropolitan Development Commission of Marion
County, Indiana, acting as the Redevelopment Commission of the City of
Indianapolis, Indiana.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Commission Lease Agreement&#148; means the Commission Lease Agreement dated
as of December&nbsp;1, 1991 between the Commission and the Authority, as the
same has been or may hereafter be amended or supplemented from time to time.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Common Area&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1401 of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Condemnation&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1602(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Condition&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2105(A)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Corporate Overhead&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)(c)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Corporate Overhead Allocation Guidelines&#148; has the meaning set forth in
Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)(c)&nbsp;of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Credits&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(B)(1)&nbsp;below.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Credit Thresholds&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(B)(1)&nbsp;below.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Deficit&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;501(B)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Effective Date&#148; has the meaning set forth in the Preamble to this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Employees&#148; means, as to Tenant or its subtenants, respectively,
Persons who are either employed directly or indirectly by Tenant or a
subtenant, respectively, or are contracted by Tenant or a subtenant,
respectively, to perform day-to-day work that would otherwise be performed by
employees of Tenant or a subtenant, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Entity&#148; means any corporation, partnership, limited partnership,
limited liability partnership, joint venture, association, limited liability
company, joint-stock company, trust, or other entity or unincorporated
association, or any Governmental Entity.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Environmental Audits&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;705(D)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\kthiyag\05-12324-2\task497002\12324-2-ki-01.htm',USER='kkthiyagarajan',CD='Jul 19 05:11 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Environmental Laws&#148; means all Federal, State and local laws, including
without limitation all statutes, regulations, ordinances, codes, rules,
policies, orders, decrees, guidance, guidelines, conditions, permits issued to
the Authority, and other governmental restrictions and requirements, relating
to the environment or Hazardous Materials, and shall include, without
limitation, the Federal Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and
Liability Act of 1980 as amended by the Superfund Amendments and
Reauthorization Act of 1986, the Federal Solid Waste Disposal Act, the
Occupational Safety and Health Act, the Federal Water Pollution Control Act,
the Federal Clean Air Act, the Federal Clean Water Act, the Resource
Conservation and Recovery Act of 1976, the Safe Drinking Water Act, the Toxic
Substances Control Act, the Refuse Act, the Hazardous Materials Transportation
Act, the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, the Federal
Insecticide, Fungicide and Rodenticide Act, the Endangered Species Act, the
National Environmental Policy Act, regulations of the Environmental Protection
Agency, regulations of the Nuclear Regulatory Agency, the Indiana Air and Water
Pollution Control Law, the Indiana Groundwater Protection Act, the Indiana
Hazardous Waste Law, the Indiana Underground Storage Tanks Act, the Indiana
Wastewater Management Law, the Indiana Fish and Wildlife Act, the Indiana Flood
Control Act, the Indiana Environmental Policy Act, the Indiana Environmental
Management Act, regulations of any State Department of Natural Resources or
State Environmental Protection Agency, Environment, Health and Safety
Requirements, and any amendments or supplements thereto and any rules&nbsp;or
regulations promulgated pursuant thereto or in connection therewith, as now or
anytime hereafter in effect.&#160; The term &#147;Environmental
Laws&#148; shall include regulations, ordinances, codes, rules, policies, guidance,
guidelines, conditions, restrictions and requirements relating to the
environment or Hazardous Materials that are issued, passed or imposed by the
Authority, whether now or hereafter in effect, to the extent those regulations,
ordinances, codes, rules, policies, guidance, guidelines, restrictions or
requirements are or would be generally applicable to any tenant or other Person
who is operating or conducting business at the Airport or to the extent
generally applicable to the public.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Environment, Health and Safety Requirements&#148; means all of the terms
and conditions of all permits, licenses, and other authorizations which are
required under, and all other limitations, restrictions, conditions, standards,
prohibitions, requirements, obligations, schedules, and timetables which are
contained in, any and all Laws relating to public health and safety, worker
health and safety, or pollution or protection of the environment, including
without limitation Environmental Laws relating to emissions, discharges,
releases, or threatened releases of Hazardous Materials into ambient air,
surface water, ground water, or lands, or otherwise relating to the manufacture,
processing, distribution, use, treatment, storage, disposal, transport, or
handling of Hazardous Materials.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Equipment&#148; means the equipment, fixtures, permanent inventory,
tangible personal property, tooling (including general tooling and aircraft
maintenance tooling), or other items of property made available by the
Authority to Tenant whether now owned or hereafter acquired, as the same shall
be substituted or replaced from time to time in accordance with Article&nbsp;X,
all as identified on the Authority&#146;s Master List of Equipment from time to
time, and all products and proceeds thereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Estimated Completion Date&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1601(C)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Estimated Facilities Costs and Expenses&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(B)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Event of Default&#148; means, with respect to Tenant, any of the Events of
Default set forth in Section&nbsp;1901 hereof and, with respect to the
Authority, any of the Events of Default set forth in Section&nbsp;1801 hereof.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Excluded Property&#148; means the equipment, permanent inventory or
tangible personal property of Tenant located at the Leased Premises, as
identified on Tenant&#146;s Master List of Excluded Property from time to time; provided,
however, that aircraft parts inventory, shop supplies, and office supplies
shall always be Excluded Property and need not be identified on the Master List
of Excluded Property.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Excluded Systems&#148; means those utilities and/or building systems at the
Facilities that the Authority and Tenant mutually determine that the Authority
will not be obligated to make operational or to furnish to Tenant under this
Lease.&#160; Among other utilities and/or
building systems that may be Excluded Systems, the fueling system at the
Facilities shall be deemed to be an &#147;Excluded System&#148;.&#160; Once the Authority and Tenant have mutually
determined that a particular utility or building system is an &#147;Excluded System&#148;,
that utility or building system shall thereafter remain an &#147;Excluded System&#148;
unless the Authority and Tenant mutually agree otherwise.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Expansion Area&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;401 of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Expansion Option&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;401 of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Expansion Space&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;401 of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Extension Notice&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;501(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Extension Option&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;501(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Extension Term&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;501(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;FAA&#148; means the Federal Aviation Administration.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Facility&#148; or &#147;Facilities&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the buildings, structures,
improvements and facilities located on the Land, whether now or hereafter
existing and wherever located; and (b)&nbsp;any extensions, improvements,
replacements, and additions to and personal property (including, without
limitation, equipment, fixtures and permanent inventory) for such buildings,
structures, improvements and facilities, whether now or hereafter existing,
that are located on the Land.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Facilities Manager&#148; means the Person designated by the Authority, from
time to time, to be located &#147;on-site&#148; and to serve as the &#147;facilities manager&#148;
for the Facilities.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Facilities Security Rules&nbsp;and Regulations&#148; has the meaning set
forth in Section&nbsp;902 of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\kthiyag\05-12324-2\task497002\12324-2-ki-01.htm',USER='kkthiyagarajan',CD='Jul 19 05:11 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Facilities Systems&#148; means those Utilities and building systems, other
than Excluded Systems, that are applicable to a particular area within the
Leased Premises, which exist and shall be operable as of the Activation Date
for that particular area of the Leased Premises.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Final Audit&#148; had the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1005(B)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Full-Time Equivalent&#148; means, with respect to an Indiana Resident
Employee, that the Indiana Resident Employee is hired to perform, and with rare
exception has performed, no fewer than eight (8)&nbsp;hours of a work day, five
(5)&nbsp;days per week, in ninety percent (90%) of the weeks during the period
in question.&#160; In determining the number
of &#147;Full-Time Equivalent&#148; Indiana Resident Employees for a particular period,
the total number of hours per week worked during that period by Indiana
Resident Employees who do not, individually, qualify as &#147;full time&#148; pursuant to
the preceding sentence will be added and divided by forty (40).&#160; The quotient shall be rounded to the nearest
whole number and shall be included toward the number of &#147;Full-Time Equivalent&#148;
Indiana Resident Employees that Tenant is to be credited with having employed
during the period in question.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;GAAP&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)&nbsp;of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Governmental Entity&#148; means any court, government agency, department,
commission, board, bureau, office, officer or instrumentality of the United
States, any local, county, state, federal or political subdivision thereof, or
any foreign governmental entity of any kind, including but not limited to the
Authority.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Grant Proceeds&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Grant-Related Expenditures&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Grants&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Grant Thresholds&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Gross Sales&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Group&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Group Expenses&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Group Overhead&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(3)(b)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Hangar&#148; means those areas at the Facilities that are described as &#147;hangars&#148;
in <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;B</font></b>.&#160;&#160; Each Hangar (with the exception of Hangar 4)
consists of two (2)&nbsp;Bays.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Hazardous Materials&#148; means any hazardous or toxic substance and any pollutant
or contaminant, material or waste which is or becomes regulated by any local
Governmental Entity, the State of Indiana or the United States Government,
including, without limitation, any material</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or substance which is (a)&nbsp;petroleum,
batteries, or liquid solvents or similar chemicals, (b)&nbsp;asbestos, (c)&nbsp;radioactive
material or waste, (d)&nbsp;polychlorinated biphenyls (&#147;PCBs&#148;), (e)&nbsp;designated
as a &#147;hazardous substance&#148; pursuant to Section&nbsp;311 of the Federal Water
Pollution Control Act (33 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1317), (f)&nbsp;defined as a &#147;hazardous
waste&#148; pursuant to Section&nbsp;1004 of the Federal Resource Conservation and
Recovery Act, 42 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;6901 et seq. (42 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;6903), or
pursuant to Section&nbsp;13-11-2-99 of the Indiana Code, or determined to be a &#147;hazardous
waste&#148; under Section&nbsp;13-22-2-3(b)&nbsp;of the Indiana Code, (g)&nbsp;defined
as a &#147;hazardous substance&#148; pursuant to Section&nbsp;101 of the Comprehensive
Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Act, of 1980, as amended by
the Superfund Amendments and Reauthorization Act of 1986, 42 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;9601
et seq. (42 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;9601), or pursuant to Section&nbsp;13-11-2-98 of the
Indiana Code, (h)&nbsp;regulated under the Toxic Substances Control Act (15
U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;2601 et seq.) or defined as a PCB pursuant to Section&nbsp;13-11-2-155
of the Indiana Code, (i)&nbsp;defined as a &#147;contaminant&#148; pursuant to Section&nbsp;13-11-2-42
of the Indiana Code, or (j) any other substance or material similarly
classified by any other federal, state or local Law or by any rule&nbsp;or
regulation promulgated or adopted pursuant thereto, whether now existing or
hereinafter enacted.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;IDP&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;706(A)&nbsp;of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Improvement-Related Permits&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(2)(c)(iii)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Improvement Rent Credits&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(C)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Indiana Resident Employees&#148; means individuals (i)&nbsp;who are Indiana
residents, and (ii)&nbsp;who are either (a)&nbsp;employed by Tenant or its
subtenants, respectively, at the Leased Premises, or (b)&nbsp;contracted by
Tenant or its subtenants, respectively, to perform day-to-day work at the
Leased Premises that would otherwise be performed by Persons employed directly
or indirectly by Tenant or its subtenants, respectively.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Initial Term&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;501(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Invitees&#148; shall mean, as to Tenant or any of its subtenants, (i)&nbsp;any
individual who enters the&nbsp;&nbsp;Leased Premises by means of the main lobby
entrance to the Facilities, has been cleared by and issued a visitor
identification badge by Facilities security personnel at the security
checkpoint located at the main lobby entrance to the Facilities, and an
individual who bears an Authority-issued Tenant (or subtenant of Tenant) employee
badge acknowledges, in person at the security checkpoint, that such individual
is their guest and thereafter accompanies such individual from the security
checkpoint (even if that individual who bears the Authority-issued Tenant (or
subtenant of Tenant) employee badge fails to continue to accompany the
individual in violation of FAA/TSA security requirements), or&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;any
individual who is otherwise accompanied into or onto the Leased Premises by an
individual who bears an Authority-issued Tenant (or subtenant of Tenant)
employee badge (even if that individual who bears the Authority-issued Tenant
(or subtenant of Tenant) employee badge thereafter fails to continue to
accompany the individual in violation of FAA/TSA security requirements).&nbsp;
For purposes of subsection&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;above, Facilities security personnel
at the security checkpoint will not issue a visitor identification badge to an
individual unless&nbsp;&nbsp;an individual who bears an Authority-issued</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant (or subtenant of Tenant) employee
badge&nbsp;acknowledges, in person at the security checkpoint, that such
individual is&nbsp;their guest and thereafter accompanies such individual from
the security checkpoint (even if that individual who bears the Authority-issued
Tenant (or subtenant of Tenant) employee badge, fails to continue to accompany

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;ITFA&#148; means the Indiana Transportation Finance Authority created under
IC 8-9.5-8 and acting pursuant to IC 8-21-12.</font></p>

Agreement between ITFA and the Authority dated as of December&nbsp;1, 1991, as
the same has been or may hereafter be amended or supplemented from time to
time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Land&#148; means the real estate located at the Airport, as shown on the
attached <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;A</font></b>, consisting of
approximately two hundred seventeen (217) acres.&#160; The Leased Premises is located on, and
consists of, a portion of the Land.</font></p>

this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Laws&#148; means any and all applicable local, county, state, federal,
foreign or other laws, statutes, codes, regulations, ordinances, conditions,
requirements, rules, orders, decrees, consent decrees, judgments, writs,
settlement agreements, stipulations, injunctions, guidelines, demand letters,
or other governmental requirements enacted, promulgated, entered into, agreed
or imposed by any Governmental Entity from time to time, including without
limitation Environmental Laws.&#160; The term &#147;Laws&#148;
shall include all regulations, ordinances, codes, rules, conditions,
guidelines, guidance, policies, restrictions and requirements that are issued,
passed or imposed by the Authority, whether now or hereafter in effect, to the
extent those regulations, ordinances, codes, rules, conditions, guidelines,
guidance, policies, restrictions or requirements are or would be generally
applicable to any tenant or other Person who is operating or conducting
business at the Airport or to the extent generally applicable to the public. &#147;Lease
Agreement&#148; or &#147;Lease&#148; means this Lease Agreement, as the same may be amended
and supplemented.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

which that portion of the Facilities is located; (b)&nbsp;that Equipment on the
Master List of Equipment (as hereafter defined) which is provided from time to
time by the Authority to Tenant pursuant to this Lease; and (c)&nbsp;any
applicable Expansion Area as to which Tenant properly exercises its Expansion
Option pursuant to this Lease.</font></p>

in Section&nbsp;2105(A)(3)&nbsp;of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Occupied&#148; means, with respect to any portion of the Leased Premises
that Tenant has requested be Activated and for which the Authority has
completed its Activation obligations with respect thereto; provided, however,
that if the Authority completes the Activation prior to the Requested
Activation Date (as hereinafter defined) for that portion of the Leased
Premises, &#147;Occupancy&#148; of that portion of the Leased Premises shall be deemed to
commence when Tenant takes possession of or begins to conduct Tenant&#146;s Business
from that portion of the Leased Premises pursuant to Section&nbsp;205 of this
Lease which shall in no case be later than the Requested Activation Date.&#160; After a portion of the Leased Premises is
deemed to be Occupied, it shall remain Occupied unless and until Tenant has
subsequently de-Occupied that Activated portion of the Leased Premises in
accordance with Section&nbsp;205(D)&nbsp;below regardless of whether Tenant is
actually using such space in connection with Tenant&#146;s Business.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Part&nbsp;70 Permit Agreement&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;706(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Part&nbsp;70 Permit Amendment&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;706(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Percentage Rent&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(1)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Percentage Rent Certificate&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Period&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;601(C)(2)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Permitted Encumbrances&#148; means those matters listed in the attached <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;C</font></b>.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Person&#148; means any individual or Entity.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Plans&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(A)(2)(c)(i)&nbsp;below.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;POTW&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;706(A)&nbsp;of this
Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Proposed Agreement&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2105(A)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Redevelopment Authority&#148; means the Marion County Convention and
Recreational Facilities Authority created under IC 36-10-9.1 and acting
pursuant to IC 36-7-15.3.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Redevelopment Lease Agreement&#148; means the
Lease Agreement between the Redevelopment Authority and the Commission, dated
as of December&nbsp;1, 1991, as the same has been or may hereafter be amended
or supplemented from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Rental&#148; means the Base Rent, Additional Rent, and Percentage Rent
assessed against Tenant pursuant to Article&nbsp;VI.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Requested Activation Date&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;205(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Right of First Refusal&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2105(A)(3)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Site and Facilities Lease Agreement&#148; means
the Site and Facilities Lease Agreement dated as of December&nbsp;1, 1991 by
and among the Authority and the Redevelopment Authority, ITFA and the
Authority, or any successors, as tenants in common under the Tenancy in Common
Agreement, as the same has been or may hereafter be amended or supplemented
from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Special
Facility Bonds&#148; means one or more series of bonds, including refunding bonds,
issued by the Authority payable in part from Rental payments under this Lease
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;State&#148; means the State of Indiana.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;State Bonds&#148; means one or more series of tax-exempt revenue bonds,
including refunding bonds, issued by ITFA, payable solely from lease rentals
payable by the Authority</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">under the ITFA Lease Agreement from any State
appropriations which may be made by the Indiana General Assembly for such purpose.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Success Payment&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;605(D)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tax Restrictions&#148; means (1)&nbsp;covenants made by the Authority in
the Settlement Agreement entered into, effective as of February&nbsp;13, 2004,
between the Authority and The Bank of New York Trust Company, N.A., and (2)&nbsp;all
rules&nbsp;and restrictions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended,
as such rules&nbsp;and restrictions apply to the use of the Facilities due to
its financing with tax-exempt bonds.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenancy in Common Agreement&#148; means the
Agreement Among Tenants of Leasehold Estate in Airport Development Project by
and among the Redevelopment Authority, ITFA, and the Authority, as tenants in
common, dated as of December&nbsp;1, 1991, as the same has been or may
hereafter be supplemented or amended from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant&#148; means AAR Aircraft Services,&nbsp;Inc., an Illinois
corporation doing business as AAR Aircraft Services - Indianapolis.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant Fiscal Year&#148; means the period from June&nbsp;1 of any year
through May&nbsp;31 of the following year.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant Reimbursement Parties&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1702(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant&#146;s Business&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;206(A)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant&#146;s Controller&#148; means the Person designated by Tenant as the
controller for Tenant&#146;s Business at the Leased Premises (and Tenant shall
provide written notice from time to time to the Authority as to the name of the
person who is serving from time to time as Tenant&#146;s Controller).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Tenant Termination Event&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;504(B)&nbsp;of
this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Term&#148; and &#147;Term of this Lease Agreement&#148; means, collectively, the
Initial Term and, if Tenant has properly exercised its Extension Option, the
Extension Term, unless sooner terminated as provided in this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;TSA&#148; means Transportation Security Administration.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Wastewater Treatment Facility&#148; has the
meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;706(A)&nbsp;of this Lease.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
